title: Conduct Unbecoming 1975 (Crime, Mystery) Michael York, Richard Attenborough, Trevor Howard

sources.title: Conduct Unbecoming 1975 (Crime, Mystery) Michael York, Richard Attenborough, Trevor Howard
sources.description:
An unspeakable crime among officers and ladies.
At a British Regimental party in Colonial India, the widow of Captain Scarlett is assaulted in the garden, and she accuses one of the newly arrived junior Lieutenants of the crime.

Original title: Conduct Unbecoming (1975)
This film is subtitled in many language options.

Director: Michael Anderson
Writers: Robert Enders, Barry England
Stars: Michael York, Richard Attenborough, Trevor Howard, Christopher Plummer, Susannah York
Genres: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Military & War


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
06:06 Military etiquette and scandal unfold as new officers navigate regiment traditions and interact with alluring widow.
09:37  Intrigue and misconduct unfold among military officers at a regiment, leading to tension and consequences.
23:40 Military court-martial proceedings following an incident at a ball involving an attack on a woman.
29:38 Military court trial unfolds with accusations, defense, and conflicting testimonies regarding an alleged assault on a widow.
37:19 Officer faces unfair trial, accused by Mrs. Scarlett, but ultimately pleads guilty to avoid disgrace and is kept in regiment as punishment.
47:24 Military trial reveals details of an attack on a woman by a fellow officer.
53:43 Misconduct investigation reveals a disturbing game played in the regiment, leading to a series of shocking revelations.
1:03:31 Investigation reveals a connection between two attacks on women, involving a regimental game and a sword.
1:12:52 Military officer accused of assault; investigation reveals true attacker and motive.
1:23:24 Investigation into a series of attacks within a regiment leads to a trial with unexpected twists.
1:32:59 Betrayal, honor, and guilt unravel in a regiment as dark secrets come to light.
